item.title: About Me
item.description:

My main focus is helping customers adopt Cisco technologies for Enterprise Campus Networks, including Catalyst Center, SD-Access, and associated devices.

This blog is my personal space to share insights, experiments, and discoveries in networking, AI, and beyond. Beyond tech, I enjoy photographyâ€”especially capturing open spaces and architectureâ€”and Iâ€™m always up for exploring new places, particularly around Lisbon. I also have an interest in online business, content creation, and finding new ways to share knowledge.

Feel free to connect, explore, and share your thoughts. Letâ€™s build something great together!
